misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso, a formidable presence hailing from the esteemed Hirsala Golf club, is set to make his ninth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. With a steely gaze and an unwavering focus, Miso approaches each tournament with the precision of a seasoned strategist, carefully calculating every move.

Having graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée on eight previous occasions, Miso has established himself as a force to be reckoned with. His crowning achievement came when he captured the coveted Hector Trophée, forever etching his name into the tournament's illustrious history.

Known for his meticulous attention to detail, Miso trusts only Miura irons, rumored to be so dear to him that he sleeps with them to maintain the perfect connection. It remains to be seen whether Miso can add another Hector Trophée to his name in 2025.
